title: Credit-Risk Modeling for Applicant Screening (Kalamata Capital Group)
standout_bullet: Built and evaluated credit-risk models on 100K transactions with 200 engineered features using TimeSeriesSplit and SHAP, achieving 0.82 AUC to accelerate underwriting decisions.

core.problem: Manual or heuristic-based underwriting processes required a more robust, data-driven risk assessment framework.
actions: Trained models including XGBoost, CatBoost, and regularized logistic regression
Applied TimeSeriesSplit cross-validation to preserve temporal integrity
Used SHAP for model interpretability and risk driver analysis

title: Algorithmic FX Trading Strategy Optimization
standout_bullet: Designed an end-to-end FX trading pipeline with ML-based entry prediction and risk–reward optimization, achieving 5.8% simulated net profit.

core.problem: Trading strategies required systematic entry prediction and risk–reward optimization to improve profitability.
actions: Engineered technical indicators and trading signals
Built predictive models including Random Forest and XGBoost
Simulated trades under defined risk–reward strategies

title: LLM-Based Conversational Recommender System
standout_bullet: Launched a LangChain-based conversational recommender with GPT-3.5/FLAN-T5 and Weaviate retrieval, achieving over 70% single-turn accuracy with multi-turn support.

core.problem: Traditional recommender systems lacked conversational context and multi-turn interaction capabilities.
actions: Built a conversational pipeline using LangChain
Integrated GPT-3.5 and FLAN-T5 for query understanding and response generation
Implemented Weaviate vector search for retrieval
Built a data pipeline for 1.3K restaurants and 9K reviews
